sourcesContent:
Match

  • Home
  • About us
  • Features
  • Contact Us
  • Logout
import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { User } from 'src/app/components/account/models/user.interface'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AccountService } from 'src/app/services/account.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.scss'], }) export class MenuComponent implements OnInit { currentUser$!: Observable; constructor(private accountService: AccountService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.currentUser$ = this.accountService.currentUser$; } logout() { this.accountService.logout(); } }
